title: Executive Watchface
summary: Analogue and Digital LED Style Watchface
developerAddress:
AdminExcellence Limited trading as Wearable Designs
The Castle House
Newnham
Gloucestershire
GL14 1AE
description: Hybrid Analogue and Digital LED Style Watchface with Step Counter, Weather Forecast and Current Temperature.Fully customizable colours allow you to change the colour of all elements, and analogue hands.  Additionally, features can be hidden from view to make this a highly customizable and personal watch face.Featuring 3 different Analogue hand styles, Arrow, Solid and a Bar Sweep.Features interactive mode for full display of Weather Summary.
descriptionHTML:
Hybrid Analogue and Digital LED Style Watchface with Step Counter, Weather Forecast and Current Temperature.

Fully customizable colours allow you to change the colour of all elements, and analogue hands. Additionally, features can be hidden from view to make this a highly customizable and personal watch face.

Featuring 3 different Analogue hand styles, Arrow, Solid and a Bar Sweep.

Features interactive mode for full display of Weather Summary.
comments: steps count if you add google fit steps count and possibility show only temperature without conditions, i'll raise to 5 stars. ty guys
Love it on my Huawei Watch 2

Good but improvement needed.. Great but this watch face needs a lot of the same settings and features found in their weather watch face to start with, for example syncing with Google Fit as well as ability to switch of interactions..
Pretty great I like this watch face, but it would be nice if we could change the "weather"/"steps" to something else like we can in "LED With weather"
Why is the steps not reflecting The steps still show zero all day long. What's up with that?
